org.quickstart.rcp.message

Class ActionListenerImpl<T extends javafx.event.Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.quickstart.rcp.message.ActionListenerImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<T>, org.quickstart.api.message.ActionListener<javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>

    public class ActionListenerImpl<T extends javafx.event.Event>
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<T>, org.jacpfx.api.message.ActionListener<javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>
    This class represents the JACP FX2 Event listener... this class can be assigned to components, it reacts on actions and notifies other components in JACP
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
